markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Back to Back](/Feats.aspx?ID=2012) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 181 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Marshal](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=66)

**Prerequisites**
[Marshal Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2005)

</column>

---

You excel at watching your allies' backs and helping them watch yours. As long as you and an ally are adjacent to each other, neither of you can become [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) due to flanking unless both of you are flanked. If you're adjacent to more than one ally, all eligible allies can benefit at a given time. The benefit is negated for everyone if at least you and any one eligible ally are flanked, but not if your allies are flanked and you aren't.
name: Back to Back
